events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my recent order. The product does not match what I originally purchased.
System has categorized the customer's issue under the Refund cluster based on their request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help with processing your refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify your claim and proceed?
Sure, my order number is 8429301 and I have attached photos showing that the product is different from what was listed on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a free return shipping label for you to send the item back.
Thanks for your prompt response and solution. I appreciate the free return label and look forward to the refund being processed quickly.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Since the refund issue has been resolved and no further queries were received, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
